title: The Day the Sky Turned Black

video_script.description: Experience an intense journey through the aftermath of nuclear war, where survival hinges on hope amid a dark and frozen world.

scenes.description: Boom! The sky dims as explosions echo worldwide. This is not just another alert â€“ it's the start of the nuclear winter.
scenes.visual_prompt: Title Picture: A dramatic illustration of a frozen world under darkened skies. The phrase "The Day the Sky Turned Black" etched onto a crumbling sign amidst snowfall. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic, cinematic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: Scientists calculate devastating fallout projections on glowing monitors, faces etched with dread. Fallout could last decades.
scenes.visual_prompt: Wide-angle shot of a dimly lit control room, screens aglow with nuclear fallout maps. Scientists appear small, overwhelmed by their task. Blue hour lighting creates a somber mood. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: Around the globe, sirens blare. People rush to underground shelters, the weight of despair in their hurried steps.
scenes.visual_prompt: Bird's-eye view of panicked crowds filling subway entrances like tidal waves. Golden hour light, casting long, frantic shadows. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: A family huddles in their basement, radio crackling with chilling silence. The question hangs: "Will life ever return to normal?"
scenes.visual_prompt: Intimate close-up of a family under dim emergency lights, listening with widened eyes to a static-filled radio. Inside view, capturing tension and vulnerability. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: Outside, eerie silence envelops desolate streets. Ash blankets everything, suffocating the life that once was.
scenes.visual_prompt: Low-angle shot of an empty town square, asphalt covered in grey ash. The sky is a dull yellow. Early evening, eerie ambience. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: Community leaders attempt to establish order, rationing dwindling supplies. Conflict looms as resources run low.
scenes.visual_prompt: High-angle shot capturing a tense meeting in a makeshift community hall. Candles scattered on a table, faces half-lit in the dim space. Night scene, claustrophobic feel. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: Wildlife and ecosystems collapse. Muted sounds of nature contrast with the desolation.
scenes.visual_prompt: Macro shot of frozen plants, leaves coated in thick ash. Muted, monochrome palette, emphasizing life trapped in stasis. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: In a hidden lab, scientists race to develop new crops that can survive the cold. Time is the enemy.
scenes.visual_prompt: Close-up of lab experiments, under artificial light, researchers working against a ticking clock. Sweaty faces, intense concentration. Macro lens for precision. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: Communities break down. The streets grow more dangerous as hope dims.
scenes.visual_prompt: Wide-angle shot of dilapidated urban streets with sporadic shadowy figures. Overcast noon, desaturation emphasizing bleakness. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: A brave young woman ventures out searching for answers, hope flickering in her eyes despite the cold.
scenes.visual_prompt: Standard lens capturing a lone, determined figure amidst ruins, eyes fixed on the distant horizon under a grey sky. Evening glow trying to pierce through. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: In distant labs, a breakthrough emerges, hinting at renewal. Will humanity's tenacity shine against the darkness?
scenes.visual_prompt: Split-screen: Scientists rejoicing with newfound hope. On the other side, survivors watching a rising sun on a makeshift screen. Bright contrasts reflect rebirth. Wide-angle lens to depict hope and uncertainty. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6

scenes.description: The first vibrant sunrise breaks the icy shroud, painting hope in the sky. Life hesitantly stirs as a new chapter begins.
scenes.visual_prompt: Telephoto lens focusing on a spectacular sunrise over a shattered cityscape, with a human silhouette reaching towards a brighter future. by Jakub Rozalski. Photorealistic, cinematic --ar 9:16 --style raw --s 500 --v 6
